title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: I actually like Ascension, but come on. Back to back doombots and back to back Ascension to follow? I thought this queue was about variety.
yeap. and when we ask for urf twice in a row riot gives us the middle finger
Wait we are getting double ascension YAAAAAAY! kappa
do you know what kappa actually is, to put it simply, its a japanese river rape turtle used as an excuse to tell children not to go too close to rivers
am i the only one who likes ascension?
fun at first but it deteriorates quickly, so it can be immensly fun is given a good gap between{{champion:81}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:84}}
It's alright, it's not the best mode but i still think it's more fun than PoroKing, HexaKill and Definitely Not Dominion. Disappointing to see it 2 weeks in a row though.
nope i love it before they made it so u cant steal xerath kill ;3

can you make the pulsefire ezreal/spirit guard udyr/ Dj Sona banner thing on your profile without putting the icon on? so like have the banner without putting the icon on{{champion:81}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:37}}
Double ascension? Are you mad. Why RIOT WHY
